Interface BlackLabIndexWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, BlackLabIndex, Closeable

extends BlackLabIndex

    • Method Detail

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        Call this to roll back any changes made to the index this session. Calling close() will automatically commit any changes. If you call this method, then call close(), no changes will be committed.

      • metadataWriter

        IndexMetadataWriter metadataWriter()
        Get information about the structure of the BlackLab index.
        Returns:
        the structure object

      • openIndexWriter

                                             throws IOException,

      • writer

        org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter writer()

      • delete

        void delete(org.apache.lucene.search.Query q)
        Deletes documents matching a query from the BlackLab index. This deletes the documents from the Lucene index, the forward indices and the content store(s).
        Parameters:
        q - the query

      • getOrCreateAnnotation

        Annotation getOrCreateAnnotation(AnnotatedField field,
                                 String annotName)
        Get existing annotation or create new one.
        Parameters:
        field - field for which this annotation is
        annotName - annotation name
        Returns:
        annotation

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Is the indexer still open? It can be closed unexpectedly if e.g. the GC overhead limit is exceeded. If that happened, we should stop indexing.
        Returns:
        true if the indexer was closed, false if not
